mapper.insert: insert into freeboard_comment values(#{articleNo}, ifnull(max(comment_no), 0)+1 from freeboard_comment as f where article_no = #{articleNo}), #{id}, #{content}, #{regDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from freeboard_comment where article_no = #{articleNo}
select * from freeboard_comment where article_no = #{articleNo} order by comment_no desc limit #{commentNo};
